name: Deconstructed
tagline: This project is the main public facing site for Deconstructed. It provides a public corporate view about the service that Deconstructed offers. The theme, site code, documentation and other information are all located here. Some of the post-theme design is located in wikies.
body: For documentation on Storgie and the respective services, navigate over to the Deconstructed Docs here: http://docs.deconstructed.io/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
